verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. Hold not thy <S%H2790>peace<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H8416>praise<s%>;

For the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit<s%> have they <S%H6605>opened<s%> against <S%H1696>me<s%>: They have spoken unto me with a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%>.
They have <S%H5437>compassed<s%> me about also with <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H8135>hatred<s%>, And <S%H3898>fought<s%> against me without a <S%H2600>cause<s%>.
For my <S%H160>love<s%> they are my <S%H7853>adversaries<s%>: But I give myself unto <S%H8605>prayer<s%>.
And they have <S%H7760>rewarded<s%> me <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%>, And <S%H8135>hatred<s%> for my <S%H160>love<s%>.
Set <S%H6485><s%> thou a wicked <S%H7563>man<s%> over <S%H7854>him<s%>; And let an adversary <S%H5975>stand<s%> at his right <S%H3225>hand<s%>.
When he is <S%H8199>judged<s%>, let him come <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H7563>guilty<s%>; And let his <S%H8605>prayer<s%> be turned into <S%H2401>sin<s%>.
Let his <S%H3117>days<s%> be <S%H4592>few<s%>; And let <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H6486>office<s%>.
Let his <S%H1121>children<s%> be <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, And his <S%H802>wife<s%> a <S%H490>widow<s%>.
Let his <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5128>be<s%> <S%H5128>vagabonds<s%>, and <S%H7592>beg<s%>; And let them <S%H1875>seek<s%> their bread out of their desolate <S%H2723>places<s%>.
Let the <S%H5383>extortioner<s%> <S%H5367>catch<s%> all that he <S%H2114>hath<s%>; And let strangers make <S%H962>spoil<s%> of his <S%H3018>labor<s%>.
Let there be none to <S%H4900>extend<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> unto <S%H2603>him<s%>; Neither let there be any to have pity on his fatherless <S%H3490>children<s%>.
Let his <S%H319>posterity<s%> be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>; In the <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H312>following<s%> let their <S%H8034>name<s%> be blotted <S%H4229>out<s%>.
Let the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%> be <S%H2142>remembered<s%> with <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; And let not the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of his <S%H517>mother<s%> be blotted <S%H4229>out<s%>.
Let them be before <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>, That he may cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H2143>memory<s%> of them from the <S%H776>earth<s%>;

Because he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> not to <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%>, But <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H6041>needy<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, And the <S%H3512>broken<s%> in <S%H3824>heart<s%>, to slay <S%H4191>them<s%>.
Yea <S%H157><s%>, he loved <S%H7045>cursing<s%>, and it <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H2654>him<s%>; And he delighted not in <S%H1293>blessing<s%>, and it was far from <S%H7368>him<s%>.

He <S%H3847>clothed<s%> himself also with <S%H7045>cursing<s%> as with his <S%H4055>garment<s%>, And it <S%H935>came<s%> into his <S%H7130>inward<s%> parts like <S%H4325>water<s%>, And like <S%H8081>oil<s%> into his <S%H6106>bones<s%>.
Let it be unto him as the <S%H899>raiment<s%> wherewith he <S%H5844>covereth<s%> <S%H4206>himself<s%>, And for the girdle wherewith he is <S%H2296>girded<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.
This is the <S%H6468>reward<s%> of mine <S%H7853>adversaries<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, And of them that <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> against my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

But <S%H6213>deal<s%> thou with <S%H3069>me<s%>, O Jehovah the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, for thy <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H2617>sake<s%>: Because thy lovingkindness is <S%H2896>good<s%>, deliver thou <S%H5337>me<s%>;
For I am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>, And my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2490>wounded<s%> within <S%H7130>me<s%>.
I am <S%H1980>gone<s%> like the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> when it <S%H5186>declineth<s%>: I am tossed up and <S%H5287>down<s%> as the <S%H697>locust<s%>.
My <S%H1290>knees<s%> are <S%H3782>weak<s%> through <S%H6685>fasting<s%>; And my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H3584>faileth<s%> of <S%H8081>fatness<s%>.
I am become also a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> unto <S%H7200>them<s%>: When they see <S%H5128>me<s%>, they shake their <S%H7218>head<s%>.
Help <S%H5826><s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah my <S%H430>God<s%>; Oh <S%H3467>save<s%> me according to thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>:
That they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that this is thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>; That <S%H3068>thou<s%>, Jehovah, hast done <S%H6213>it<s%>.
Let them <S%H7043>curse<s%>, but <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H6965>thou<s%>: When they arise, they shall be put to <S%H954>shame<s%>, But thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>.
Let mine <S%H7853>adversaries<s%> be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H3639>dishonor<s%>, And let them <S%H5844>cover<s%> themselves with their own <S%H1322>shame<s%> as with a <S%H4598>robe<s%>.
I will give <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; <S%H1984>Yea<s%>, I will praise him <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H7227>multitude<s%>.
For he will <S%H5975>stand<s%> at the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the <S%H34>needy<s%>, To <S%H3467>save<s%> him from them that <S%H8199>judge<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
